contest-event.event-date:
March 26, 1951 D Leicester Brass Band Festival (2nd Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-of-leicester-brass-band-festival-2nd-section
Macbeth [Verdi arr. Greenwood]
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £25, 2nd £15, 3rd £10, 4th £7. 24th Annual Contest. 18 bands competed.
Dec. 8, 2011, 2:53 p.m. March 11, 2019, 12:57 p.m.
